title: New Paper in JIST by Giulio Fanti: Regarding the Formation of the Body Image on the Turin Shroud
post:
Thank you Dan !
I have downloaded the article, and for sure it’s a must-read : clearly written and informative.
But there is one thing that puzzles me. I don’t understand why Giulio Fanti never mentions in his articles the results published by other Italian physicists in Radiation Effects and Defects in Solids (http://www.tandfonline.com/action/doSearch?type=simple&filter=multiple&stemming=yes&searchText=turin+shroud&x=0&y=0&publication=40000603)
Fazio and Mandaglio (the leaders of this team from Messina, Sicily) remain skeptical about corona discharge and even in their last paper about double superficiality (http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/10420150.2011.629320)
So my question is:  is there a kind of schism between Italian shroudies?
Thanks.
author: cazab
